scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rimraf ./dist && tsc && shx mkdir -p dist/application_constants && shx cp src/.env.* dist/ && shx cp src/application_constants/welcome_markdown.md dist/application_constants/ && shx cp src/application_constants/welcome_markdown_angular.md dist/application_constants/
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development shx mkdir -p dist/application_constants && shx cp src/.env.* dist/ && shx cp src/application_constants/welcome_markdown.md dist/application_constants/ && shx cp src/application_constants/welcome_markdown_angular.md dist/application_constants/ && concurrently "tsc --watch" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --ext * dist/index.js"
